        public boolean decideOnRepair(int id)
        Customer's method. The customer starts his life span in the outside world until he decides do repair his car. Furthermore, he also decides if he is going to need a replacement car or not.
        Specified by:

      • backToWorkByBus

                               int id)
        Customer's method. After going back to work by bus, the customer waits for the manager to tell him that his car has been repaired.
        Specified by:

      • backToWorkByCar

        public boolean backToWorkByCar(boolean carRepaired,
                               int replacementCar,
                               int id)
        Customer's method. After going back to work by car (with replacement car), the customer waits for the manager to tell him that his car has been repaired.
        Specified by:

      • phoneCustomer

        public boolean phoneCustomer(int id)
        Manager's method. After knowing that the car is ready by the mechanic, the manager calls the customer to get his car back.
        Specified by:
        phoneCustomer in interface IManagerOW
        Parameters:
        id - customer's id which car is ready to be picked up
        Returns:
        a boolean representing if the customer is ready to pick up the car
